name: Frontio - by NextUI
headline: Frontio simplifies frontend creation by automating design systems andâ¦
description: We began with an open-source library for React developers that enables them to create beautiful and accessible interfaces (NextUI). We are now building Frontio a complete frontend-as-a-service platform to make building the frontend part of products easier, allowing teams to focus more on their product and less on design systems and frontend complexities (frontio.ai).

founders.name: Junior Garcia, Founder
founders.description: Junior Garcia is the Founder and CEO of Zigma and the creator of NextUI. With nearly 10 years of experience as a software engineer, including his time at Deel, he is passionate about creating design systems and frontend development, as well as contributing to open-source and enhancing user interfaces

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Frontio - by NextUI**

Founded in 2023 and situated in the heart of San Francisco, Frontio is a startup that's stepping into the spotlight with a mission to transform frontend development. As a company born out of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Frontio has already made significant strides by leveraging its roots in NextUI—a previously launched open-source library for React developers known for its beautiful and accessible design capabilities.

**Mission and Product Offerings:**
Frontio aims to simplify frontend creation by automating design systems, making it easier for teams to focus on building their products rather than getting lost in the complexities of frontend development. Essentially, they are building a complete *frontend-as-a-service* platform designed to alleviate the burdens of design and implementation, allowing for a smoother workflow in product development.

Their core product facilitates the creation, management, and documentation of frontend components and design systems. In an industry that often overwhelms with complexity, Frontio stands out by promising a process that's easy, fast, and efficient.

**Team and Mentorship:**
With a compact team of three passionate employees, Frontio benefits from mentorship by Brad Flora, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. This small yet nimble team helps in ensuring that they can innovate quickly and remain responsive to their users' needs.

**Key Attributes:**
The company is tagged broadly under categories such as developer tools, SaaS, design tools, and AI. This highlights their multi-faceted approach in appealing to a broad spectrum of developers and organizations looking for solutions that can enhance their frontend experience.

**Engagement and Community:**
Frontio also maintains an active presence on major social platforms to engage with its community. They encourage users to get started for free on their platform and even offer demos to showcase the power of their solutions.

For those interested in learning more or exploring their offerings, visit their website at [frontio.ai](https://frontio.ai).

**Links:**
- [Official Website](https://frontio.ai)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/nextui-org)
- [Twitter](https://x.com/getnextui)
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nextui-org)
  
As Frontio continues its journey, it’s clear they’re positioned to not just change how frontend development is perceived, but to make it accessible and manageable for teams everywhere.
